item.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317]
item.dc:creator: @randomness15 randomness15
item.description:
@randomness15 wrote:

Alright guys, I followed the guide exactly as stated. If I had of gotten any errors server-wide I would have been fine fixing them myself.
However, I have little to no knowledge in mySQL.

Once I finish, go to my vote.html page, put in my username and press “vote!” I get this Parse error: syntax error, unexpected T_VARIABLE in D:\Hosting\9796359\html\vote.php on line 76
I’m assuming it has something to do with my vote.php because when I go to it, the page loads the error.

Anyone know what is causing this?
Thanks!

item.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317]
item.dc:creator: @Concerned_citizen Concerned citizen
item.description:
@Concerned_citizen wrote:

[quote=“Pouch, post:9, topic:338226”]if(MYSQL.checkVotes(playerName)){
if(freeSlots() > 2)
{
if(MYSQL.voteGiven(playerName))
{
addItem(995,5000000);
sM(“Thank you for voting!”);
}
}else{
sM(“You do not have enough free space to receive items”);
}
}

that makes you get 5m per time u login if u voted at least once…

fix it[/quote]

I believe the code you would want instead would be:

if(MYSQL.checkVotes(playerName)){
if(freeSlots() > 2)
{
if(MYSQL.voteGiven(playerName))
{
addItem(995,5000000);
sM(“Thank you for voting!”);
MYSQL.voteGiven(playerName) == false;
}
}else{
sM(“You do not have enough free space to receive items”);
}
}

If what I did is correct, it should turn the statement off every time the player receives the reward.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mostwanted8 mostwanted8
item.description:
@mostwanted8 wrote:

i keep getting this erro when i try to vote
Warning: mysql_connect(): Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: YES) in /home/voteextr/public_html/vote.php on line 8 cannot connect
and here is my php code [code]<?php

$host=“localhost”;
$username=“root”;
$password=“rikuamaru”;
$db_name=“votes”;

$link = mysql_connect("$host", “$username”, “$password”)or die(“cannot connect”);
mysql_select_db("$db_name")or die(“cannot select DB”);

$username=$_POST[‘username’];
$voteid = ($_POST[‘votenum’]);

$username = stripslashes($username);
$username = mysql_real_escape_string($username);

$time = time();
$ip = $_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’];

    if(clean_requests($time))
    {
            if(vote_entries($ip) == 0)
            {
                    mysql_query("INSERT INTO Votes (username, ip, time, recieved) VALUES ('$username', '$ip', '$time', '0')", $link) or die("An internal error has occured please try again later.<br/>To go back click <a href='index.php'><b>HERE</b></a>");
                    header("Location: ".votenow($voteid)."");[/code]

item.title: [317] Give users GP for voting on a website! [317]
item.dc:creator: @conan300 conan300
item.description:
@conan300 wrote:

[quote=“gunnz94, post:63, topic:338226”]Hello,
I am not very good at MYSQL or PHP
So i get a few errors when starting the server and voting
The Following:
WEBSITE SIDED:

[quote]Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: YES) in /home/gunnz94/public_html/vote.php on line 8
cannot connect[/quote]

Does that mean I cannot use XXAMP MySQL i have to use the webhosters MYSQL? (PHPMYADMIN)??[/quote]

no u can use xampp. u just didn’t change the connecting details. open vote.php and search for :

$host="localhost"; $username="root"; $password="CHANGE THE PASSWORD HERE"; $db_name="CHANGE THE DATABASE HERE";

keep localhost and root as it. just change the pass if u remember, and the database.

and Server Sided: ThIS IS IN THE RUN.BAT IDK IF I AM SUPPOSED TO PUT SOMETHING INTO THE RUN.BAT BUT IT GIVES THIS ERROR AND JUST KEEPS SRELOGGING IN AND THEN LOGS OUT:

[quote] BAX Server.
Connection frmo 127.0.0.1:50123
[client-1-Testervotes]: Testervotes has logged in
null
null
null
null
null
null
null
null
null
null
null
null
(AND SO ON)
and then
Testervotes has logged out.
null[/quote]

you didn’t put

if(MYSQL.checkVotes(playerName)){ if(freeSlots() > 2) { if(MYSQL.voteGiven(playerName)) { giveItem(995,5000000); sendMessage("Thank you for voting!"); } }else{ sendMessage("You do not have enough free space to receive items"); } }

OR (if your source is delta )

if(MYSQL.checkVotes(playerName)){ if(freeSlots() > 2) { if(MYSQL.voteGiven(playerName)) { addItem(995,5000000); sM("Thank you for voting!"); } }else{ sM("You do not have enough free space to receive items"); } }

in the right place.

THIS TUTORIAL GOT MANY BUGS AND ERROR TO FIX AND WILL NEVER WORK

Read full topic

@gunnz94 wrote:

Hello,
I am not very good at MYSQL or PHP
So i get a few errors when starting the server and voting
The Following:
WEBSITE SIDED:

Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: YES) in /home/gunnz94/public_html/vote.php on line 8 cannot connect

Does that mean I cannot use XXAMP MySQL i have to use the webhosters MYSQL? (PHPMYADMIN)??

and Server Sided:
ThIS IS IN THE RUN.BAT
IDK IF I AM SUPPOSED TO PUT SOMETHING INTO THE RUN.BAT BUT IT GIVES THIS ERROR AND JUST KEEPS SRELOGGING IN AND THEN LOGS OUT:

BAX Server. Connection frmo 127.0.0.1:50123 [client-1-Testervotes]: Testervotes has logged in null null null null null null null null null null null null (AND SO ON) and then Testervotes has logged out. null

AND THIS IS WHAT I HAVE IN MY Run.BAT file

@echo off title Your Server Name Here echo Blank Server is Starting! java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Thanks for your help!
Gunnz94 (TheBNM)
